thread.title: Dave Mustaine Hoping To Launch Official Column Or Video Series With Megadeth Guitar Lessons [News]
thread.title_full: Dave Mustaine Hoping To Launch Official Column Or Video Series With Megadeth Guitar Lessons [News]

title: Dave Mustaine Hoping To Launch Official Column Or Video Series With Megadeth Guitar Lessons [News]
text:
Dave Mustaine Hoping to Launch Official Column or Video Series With Megadeth Guitar Lessons "I am discussing it. It's just hard to get a crew, etc," the frontman explains. Posted 2 hours ago 4 
Dave Mustaine revealed he'd like to "finally" launch a column or video series with guitar lessons. 
Megadeth frontman briefly tweeted : "I am thinking of making a column of something will official guitar lessons finally," adding , "I am discussing [video lessons]. It's just hard to get a crew, etc." 
One of the recent trending stories of the guitar domain was Dave pointing out that the majority of " Holy Wars " tabs on the web are not 100% correct. Soon after, Mustaine tweeted us the proper tab to play the iconic tune. You can check it out here .
